Title: Data Schema Freeze
Description:
Define canonical symbols, intervals, adjustments, and corporate actions.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Checksums and row-count parity across mirrored stores
- Drift < 0.1% week-over-week
- Schema documentation complete
- Data dictionary published

Title: Feed Watchdogs Setup
Description:
Implement health checks for latency, gap detection, and source quorum.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Alerts within 30s of missing bars
- Auto backfill succeeds 3 consecutive runs
- Monitoring dashboard live
- Runbook for manual intervention

Title: Baseline Models Implementation
Description:
Build momentum, mean-reversion, regime classifiers, naÃ¯ve Bayes models.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Reproducible runs with fixed seeds
- Report ZIPs with plots and CSVs
- Model cards documented
- Performance metrics captured

Title: Blind Backtests Execution
Description:
Run time-sliced out-of-sample evaluations with embargo periods.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- No code access for validators
- Results signed and timestamped
- Audit trail stored in evidence locker
- Independent verification documented

Title: Accuracy Thresholds Definition
Description:
Define pre-set cutoffs for trend, reversal, anomaly detection.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Thresholds met in 3 independent datasets
- P-values documented
- Statistical methodology reviewed
- Confidence intervals stated

Title: Private Tester NDA Program
Description:
Onboard testers under NDA with secure portal and feedback capture.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- 10 testers onboarded
- Feedback variance analyzed
- No PII leakage verified
- NDA signed and filed

Title: Data Integrity Automation Job
Description:
Nightly checksums, schema diffs, drift reports with auto-ticket on failure.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Cron job scheduled and running
- Tickets auto-created on failures
- Retry logic implemented
- Logs captured in observability platform

Title: Benchmark Pipeline Automation
Description:
Parameter grid runs, artifact bundling, hash-stamped reports linked to Linear.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Pipeline triggers on schedule and on-demand
- Artifacts uploaded to evidence locker
- Linear issues updated with links
- Regression alerts configured

Title: Backtest Orchestrator
Description:
Sliding windows, embargo logic, retries on transient errors, fail closed on regression.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Embargo periods enforced
- Transient errors retried (max 3 attempts)
- Metric regressions block progression
- Human escalation on final failure

Title: Evidence Locker Setup
Description:
Immutable storage for PDFs/CSVs/plots with Linear issue attachments and hash recording.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Storage bucket configured
- Hash recorded in issue comments
- Retention policy set
- Access audit logging enabled

Title: Gatekeeper Automation Rules
Description:
Status automation blocking 'Validated' unless evidence and tests pass.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Linear workflow rules configured
- Manual override requires approval
- Audit log for state transitions
- Documentation complete
